title: Research has shown that music can reduce your perception of exhaustion during a moderate workout and...

attachments.displayName:
Research has shown that music can reduce your perception of exhaustion during a moderate workout and boost your physical output. What’s more, syncing your movements with a musical beat seems to increase stamina and metabolic efficiency.

Also, read about the Mafa tribe and how they reach musical ecstasy through exercise in this incredible National Geographic here → http://buff.ly/1ibkE6G
